value.title: StarCraft 2: TACTICAL NUKES HIS OWN BASE?! (Cure vs Trap)
value.excerpt: One of the best series of Terran versus Protoss at the top level of StarCraft 2 that I've seen this year. value.title: StarCraft 2: THE MOST PAINFUL MATCH EVER? (Florencio's Cheese)
value.excerpt: A very fun match of StarCraft 2. This has to be one of the most painful and smartest games of StarCraft I've casted. In this game Florencio combines two flavours of cheese to create the perfect early game push.
